long_description: Breathable, snug and durable, the women-specific Shimano WM63 Bike Shoes transfer power to the pedals and comfort to the rider on off-road riding adventures. Tough uppers made of synthetic leather and mesh resist stretching for a secure ride. Micro-adjustable ratcheting buckle and dual offset straps deliver a precise fit. Fiberglass-reinforced polyamide midsole plate provides optimum sole rigidity. Shimano WM63 Bike Shoes for women feature durable rubber tread for excellent traction and walking comfort.
short_description: Breathable, snug and durable, the women-specific Shimano WM63 Bike Shoes transfer power to the pedals and comfort to the rider on off-road riding adventures.
